onboard_text2: We created this program to make people's lives easier
onboard_text3: In this program, you can buy the product remotely or sell your own product yourself
onboard_text4: We are glad to see you here
want_login: If you want to register first, click the login button

recent_code: If you have not received the code

you_agree_first_register: You agree that in order to click the Like button, you must first register
